hard.title: Readable base size
hard.description: Body text must be 16px or larger on mobile.

hard.title: Touch target size
hard.description: Interactive targets must be at least 44x44px.

hard.title: Text contrast
hard.description: Normal text must meet 4.5:1 contrast ratio.

hard.title: No horizontal scroll
hard.description: Content must fit within the viewport width on mobile.

hard.title: Form labels
hard.description: All form inputs must have associated label elements.

hard.title: Visible focus
hard.description: Interactive elements must show visible focus styles.

soft.title: Comfortable line height
soft.description: Body text line-height should be between 1.4 and 1.8.

soft.title: Readable line length
soft.description: Limit paragraphs to roughly 65-75 characters per line.

soft.title: Tap-first interactions
soft.description: Primary actions should use click/tap, not hover-only behavior.

soft.title: Loading feedback
soft.description: Use a skeleton or spinner for async actions and disable buttons while pending.
